Test Name: Amphetamines, Umbilical Cord Tissue (Immunoassay with LC-MS/MS confirmation)
Purpose: To detect and quantify amphetamines in umbilical cord tissue using immunoassay screening followed by confirmatory LC-MS/MS.
Container: Sterile, sealed container for umbilical cord tissue
Equipment: Centrifuge; Homogenizer; Immunoassay analyzer; HPLC system coupled to Tandem Mass Spectrometer (LC-MS/MS); supporting lab instruments (microbalance, vortex mixer, incubator)
